item.title: How to use local provider in Terraform
item.description: Enable local Terraform provider for Testing/Development Introduction Recently, we faced an issue with databricks/databricks provider and we spend alomost 2 weeks figuring out an auth issue that we saw in the provider for storage_account for th Unity Catalog. And thus, we wanted to dive into the databricks provider golang code to see if we can add few debug statements and understand where it was failing. So we cloned the repo from GitHub, made the changes and used the contributing.
